Borrowed(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256.details: emitted when funds are borrowed from the pool

Funded(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: emitted after a loan is funded

params.user: the address which funded the loan

Repaid(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: emitted when funds are repaid to the pool

Withdrawn(address,bytes32,uint256,uint25.details: emitted after the funds are withdrawn from the loan

params.user: the address which withdraws funds from the loan

fund(bytes32,uint256).details: Requires approval for ERC20 token on frontend side

fund(bytes32,uint256).notice: Funds the loan with a specified amount of a defined token

withdraw(bytes32,uint256).notice: Withdraws an amount of a defined asset from the loan This method could be used to cash out profits from investments The loan needs to remain solvent after the withdrawal
